text: Weekend at Dunkirk () is a 1964 French Italian World War II drama movie directed by Henri Verneuil and was based on the 1949 novel Week-end at Zuydcoote () by Robert Merle. It stars Jean-Paul Belmondo, Catherine Spaak, Jean-Pierre Marielle, Pierre Vernier, Paul Pr√©boist and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:1964 war movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies about Nazi Germany Category:World War II movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henri Verneuil
title: Weekend at Dunkirk
